titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Walter F. W. Lohnes Papers
titlestmt.author: Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Department of Special Collections and University Archives
publicationstmt.p: Copyright Â© 2015 The Board of Trustees of the Leland Stanford Junior University. All rights reserved.

note.p: This encoded finding aid is compliant with Stanford EAD Best Practice Guidelines, Version 1.0.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit

did.head: Overview
did.abstract: Correspondence, reports, manuscripts, and budget papers, ca. 1960-1985; and records from the NDEA language institutes in Bad Boll, Germany, 1960-1969, including correspondence, schedules, memoranda, course materials, and reports. The latter materials are in English and German. Records pertaining to the Institute for Basic German including minutes, correspondence, reports, and course materials, 1976-1983; materials pertaining to the development of the GRE test in German, 1969-1975; records of the Academic Council at Stanford, 1967-1971; correspondence relating to overseas studies; and other academic records.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: Accession ARCH-1999-144 contains Lohnes personnel file and is restricted. This collection is otherwise open for research.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94304-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/pubserv/permissions.html.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: Walter F. W. Lohnes Papers (SC0322). Department of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Sketch
bioghist.p: Professor of German Studies at Stanford University.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Collection
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, reports, manuscripts, and budget papers, ca. 1960-1985; and records from the NDEA language institutes in Bad Boll, Germany, 1960-1969, including correspondence, schedules, memoranda, course materials, and reports. The latter materials are in English and German. Records pertaining to the Institute for Basic German including minutes, correspondence, reports, and course materials, 1976-1983; materials pertaining to the development of the GRE test in German, 1969-1975; records of the Academic Council at Stanford, 1967-1971; correspondence relating to overseas studies; and other academic records.
